project: Aljouf Sentinel-2 Land Cover Classification (RF + NDVI/NDWI)
theme: Land cover mapping and vegetation-water indices
data: Sentinel-2 Surface Reflectance Harmonized (COPERNICUS/S2_SR_HARMONIZED); NDVI (B8-B4); NDWI (B3-B8); GCP training points (urban, baresoil, trees, road, agriculture, sand, vegetation, water, rocks)

project: Busia County Decision-Maker Dashboard (Land Cover, NDVI, Rainfall, Night-lights, Flood Risk)
theme: County-scale environmental and economic monitoring dashboard
region: Busia County, Kenya (BUSIA asset geometry) plus Budalangi 15 km buffer
data: Dynamic World (GOOGLE/DYNAMICWORLD/V1); Sentinel-2 SR (COPERNICUS/S2_SR); CHIRPS Daily (UCSB-CHG/CHIRPS/DAILY); VIIRS Annual (NOAA/VIIRS/DNB/ANNUAL_V21); VIIRS Monthly (NOAA/VIIRS/DNB/MONTHLY_V1_VCMCFG); JRC Global Surface Water (JRC/GSW1_4/GlobalSurfaceWater); SRTM DEM (USGS/SRTMGL1_003); Busia AOI asset (BUSIA)

project: Busia County VIIRS Night-lights Trends by Constituency (ADM2_EN) 2019â€“2025
theme: Night-time lights trend and constituency ranking (service proxy)
data: VIIRS Monthly Night Lights (NOAA/VIIRS/DNB/MONTHLY_V1/VCMSLCFG, avg_rad); Busia constituency boundaries asset; trend (linear fit); illuminated area stats (threshold 0.5)
